promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic legendary lion grass-type pokemon wearing white and green gemstones. It can be found in woods-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, grass or lion. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Gemleon, a a gigantic legendary lion grass-type pokemon. It can be found in woods-like environments It has the following abilities: Aroma Shot, Tough Hammer. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "lion", "grass" or "Gemleon". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of grass-type pokemon, lion-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, emerald bokeh lighting
generatedDescription: A colossus of nature, dwelling deep within forest realms, it uses Aroma Shot to lure prey, and Tough Hammer to ensure victory.
